title: Emergency evacuation maps and procedures
dataVerified: Building floor plan, exit routes, assembly points, emergency contacts
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake evacuation maps. Domain binding verifies building owner/fire department. Fire code requirement. Life safety critical. Prevents evacuation confusion during emergency. Floor-by-floor posting requirement.
